price: 难道你不知道吗？安拉从天上降下雨水，地面就变成苍翠的。安拉确是仁爱的，确是彻知的。
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَتُصۡبِحُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُخۡضَرَّةًۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٞ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina al-samāi māan fatuṣ'biḥu al-arḍu mukh'ḍarratan inna al-laha laṭīfun khabīrun
